history.proof: intros net h t ll H_reachable H_in_ll. unfold leaderLogs in H_in_ll. destruct (nwState net h) as [st__data]. simpl in H_in_ll. shelve.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
orig_base_params: BaseParams
one_node_params: OneNodeParams orig_base_params
raft_params: RaftParams orig_base_params
rri: raft_refinement_interface
llsi: leaderLogs_sorted_interface
rlmli: refined_log_matching_lemmas_interface
llci: leaderLogs_contiguous_interface
lllmi: leaderLogs_entries_match_interface
lhllsi: leaders_have_leaderLogs_strong_interface
nisi: nextIndex_safety_interface
si: sorted_interface
lpholli: log_properties_hold_on_leader_logs_interface

Goal:
forall (net : network) (h : Net.name) (t : term) (ll : list entry), refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> In (t, ll) (leaderLogs (fst (nwState net h))) -> contiguous_range_exact_lo ll 0

Premises:
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
term = nat : Set
Record sorted_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_sorted_interface { handleAppendEntries_logs_sorted : forall (net : network) (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (m : msg), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> logs_sorted net -> handleAppendEntries (pDst p) (nwState net (pDst p)) t n pli plt es ci = (st', m) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n pl
Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Arguments Build_OneNodeParams _ _ _%function_scope
Record log_properties_hold_on_leader_logs_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_log_properties_hold_on_leader_logs_interface { log_properties_hold_on_leader_logs_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> log_properties_hold_on_leader_logs net } Arguments log_properties_hold_on_leader_logs_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_log_properties_hold_on_leader_logs_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
Record BaseParams : Type := Build_BaseParams { data : Type; input : Type; output : Type } Arguments Build_BaseParams (_ _ _)%type_scope
contiguous_range_exact_lo = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (xs : list entry) (lo : nat) => (forall i : nat, lo < i <= maxIndex xs -> exists e : entry, eIndex e = i /\ In e xs) /\ (forall e : entry, In e xs -> lo < eIndex e) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), list entry -> nat -> Prop Arguments contiguous_range_exact_lo {orig_base_params raft_params} _%list_scope _%nat_scope
Record RaftParams (orig_base_params : BaseParams) : Type := Build_RaftParams { N : nat; input_eq_dec : forall x y : input, {x = y} + {x <> y}; output_eq_dec : forall x y : output, {x = y} + {x <> y}; clientId : Type; clientId_eq_dec : forall x y : clientId, {x = y} + {x <> y} } Arguments Build_RaftParams _ _%nat_scope (_ _)%function_scope [clientId]%type_scope _%function_scope
Record leaderLogs_sorted_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_leaderLogs_sorted_interface { leaderLogs_sorted_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> leaderLogs_sorted net } Arguments leaderLogs_sorted_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_leaderLogs_sorted_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
Record leaderLogs_entries_match_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_leaderLogs_entries_match_interface { leaderLogs_entries_match_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> leaderLogs_entries_match_host net } Arguments leaderLogs_entries_match_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_leaderLogs_entries_match_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
Record raft_refinement_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_raft_refinement_interface { refined_raft_net_invariant : forall (P : network -> Prop) (net : network), refined_raft_net_invariant_init P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_client_request P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_timeout P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_do_leader P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_do_generic_server
nwState = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (n : network) => let (_, nwState) := n in nwState : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), network -> Net.name -> data Arguments nwState {P params}
Record entry (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Type := mkEntry { eAt : name; eClient : clientId; eId : nat; eIndex : logIndex; eTerm : term; eInput : input } Arguments entry {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments mkEntry {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _ _%nat_scope
leaderLogs = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (e : electionsData) => let (_, _, _, leaderLogs, _) := e in leaderLogs : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), electionsData -> list (term * list entry) Arguments leaderLogs {orig_base_params raft_params}

fst = fun (A B : Type) (p : A * B) => let (x, _) := p in x : forall A B : Type, A * B -> A Arguments fst {A B}%type_scope

Record nextIndex_safety_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_nextIndex_safety_interface { nextIndex_safety_invariant : forall net : network, raft_intermediate_reachable net -> nextIndex_safety net } Arguments nextIndex_safety_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_nextIndex_safety_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
leaderLogs_contiguous = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h : Net.name) (t : term) (ll : list entry), In (t, ll) (leaderLogs (fst (nwState net h))) -> contiguous_range_exact_lo ll 0 : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments leaderLogs_contiguous {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
leaderLogs_entries_match_host = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h h' : Net.name) (t : term) (ll : list entry), In (t, ll) (leaderLogs (fst (nwState net h'))) -> entries_match (log (snd (nwState net h))) ll : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments leaderLogs_entries_match_host {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}

logs_leaderLogs_nw_weak = fun net : network => forall (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (e : entry), In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n pli plt es ci -> In e es -> exists (leader : Net.name) (ll es' ll' : list entry), In (eTerm e, ll) (leaderLogs (fst (nwState net leader))) /\ Prefix ll' ll /\ removeAfterIndex es (eIndex e) = es' ++ ll' /\ (forall e' : entry, In e' es' -> eTerm e' = eTerm e) /\ weak_sanity pli ll ll' : network -> Prop
leaders_have_leaderLogs_strong = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall h : Net.name, type (snd (nwState net h)) = Leader -> exists ll es : list entry, In (currentTerm (snd (nwState net h)), ll) (leaderLogs (fst (nwState net h))) /\ log (snd (nwState net h)) = es ++ ll /\ (forall e : entry, In e es -> eTerm e = currentTerm (snd (nwState net h))) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments leaders_have_leaderLogs_strong {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}

allEntries_gt_0_invariant : forall (net : network) (h : Net.name) (e : entry), refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> In e (map snd (allEntries (fst (nwState net h)))) -> eIndex e > 0
entries_match_nw_host = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (h : Net.name) (e e' e'' : entry), In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n pli plt es ci -> In e es -> In e' (log (snd (nwState net h))) -> eIndex e = eIndex e' -> eTerm e = eTerm e' -> In e'' es -> eIndex e'' <= eIndex e ->...-> Prop Arguments entries_match_nw_host {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
entries_gt_0 = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h : Net.name) (e : entry), In e (log (snd (nwState net h))) -> eIndex e > 0 : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments entries_gt_0 {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}

```  
intros net h t ll H_reachable H_in_ll.
unfold leaderLogs in H_in_ll.
simpl in H_in_ll.
destruct (nwState net h) as [st__data].
simpl in H_in_ll.
inversion H_in_ll as [Heq_lls].
apply Heq_lls.    
```

original: intros net h t ll H_reachable H_in_ll. unfold leaderLogs in H_in_ll. simpl in H_in_ll. destruct (nwState net h) as [st__data]. simpl in H_in_ll. inversion H_in_ll as [Heq_lls]. apply Heq_lls.
